```r
set.seed(1)
n=20
p=5
X <- generate_orthonormal_matrix(n = n, p = p)
beta = c(2,2,1,0,0)
y = X %*% beta + rnorm(n)
y = y - mean(y)
```

<!-- rnb-source-end -->

```r
set.seed(1)
n=20
p=5
X <- generate_orthonormal_matrix(n = n, p = p)
```
